title: KnotShorts is Live: First Headlines Are In
summary: KnotShorts is now running in production. This starter story confirms your deployment, API, and homepage rendering are working end-to-end.
body: This is a seed article used to confirm production deployment. You can delete it anytime from Admin once you start publishing real stories.

title: India Brief: Sample Article to Validate Category Sections
summary: This sample story ensures your India section, cards, and article routing work correctly on Render without local SQLite checked into git.
body: Once your admin publishing flow is active, you can remove these seed articles and replace them with real content.

title: Business Snapshot: Seed Story for Layout Testing
summary: A short Business story to confirm the Business section renders and sorting works by published date.
body: If you want, we can also seed Club/Spotlight/Duo configs after the first deploy is stable.

title: Tech Update: Sample Post for Testing UI Cards
summary: A Technology story for verifying badge styling and image fallbacks on production.
body: This content exists only to validate the build and UI layout after deploy.
